languages.text: "Они, без сомнений, угроза Империуму номер один, и я не оставлю без пули еретика, попадись он мне. Однако подобными делами занимаются другие имперские силы — достаточно серьезные, чтобы не упоминать их вслух лишний раз".

"Those are indeed the greatest threat to the Imperium, and I never leave a heretic I meet without a bullet lodged inside them. But such matters are primarily handled by other forces, which are influential enough so as not to be mentioned out loud without a reason."
languages.original_text: "Они, без сомнений, угроза Империуму номер один, и я не оставлю без пули еретика, попадись он мне. Однако подобными делами занимаются другие имперские силы — достаточно серьезные, чтобы не упоминать их вслух лишний раз".

"Those are indeed the greatest threat to the Imperium, and I never leave a heretic I meet without a bullet lodged inside them. But such matters are primarily handled by other forces, which are influential enough so as not to be mentioned out loud without a reason."

languages.text: 「確かに、異端者こそが帝国にとって最大の脅威です。私は出会った異端者を必ず銃弾と共に送り出しています。ですが、そうした案件は主に他の組織が担当しています。その組織の影響力は、理由もなく口にするにはあまりにも大きすぎます」
languages.original_text: "Those are indeed the greatest threat to the Imperium, and I never leave a heretic I meet without a bullet lodged inside them. But such matters are primarily handled by other forces, which are influential enough so as not to be mentioned out loud without a reason."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに、異端者こそが帝国にとって最大の脅威です。私は出会った異端者を必ず銃弾と共に送り出しています。ですが、そうした案件は主に他の組織が担当しています。その組織の影響力は、理由もなく口にするにはあまりにも大きすぎます」

languages.text: "Diese stellen in der Tat die größte Bedrohung für das Imperium dar, und ich lasse nie einen Ketzer zurück, ohne vorher eine Kugel in ihm versenkt zu haben. Aber solche Angelegenheiten werden meist von anderen Kräften erledigt, die so viel Einfluss haben, dass sie nicht grundlos laut genannt werden sollten."
languages.original_text: "Those are indeed the greatest threat to the Imperium, and I never leave a heretic I meet without a bullet lodged inside them. But such matters are primarily handled by other forces, which are influential enough so as not to be mentioned out loud without a reason."

traits.locale_text: "Diese stellen in der Tat die größte Bedrohung für das Imperium dar, und ich lasse nie einen Ketzer zurück, ohne vorher eine Kugel in ihm versenkt zu haben. Aber solche Angelegenheiten werden meist von anderen Kräften erledigt, die so viel Einfluss haben, dass sie nicht grundlos laut genannt werden sollten."

languages.text: « Il s'agit en effet des plus grandes menaces qui pèsent sur l'Imperium. Je n'ai jamais quitté un hérétique sans avoir pris le temps de lui loger une balle en pleine poitrine. Mais ces sujets sont généralement confiés à d'autres unités suffisamment influentes pour qu'il ne soit pas nécessaire de mentionner leur nom à haute voix sans raison. »
languages.original_text: "Those are indeed the greatest threat to the Imperium, and I never leave a heretic I meet without a bullet lodged inside them. But such matters are primarily handled by other forces, which are influential enough so as not to be mentioned out loud without a reason."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit en effet des plus grandes menaces qui pèsent sur l'Imperium. Je n'ai jamais quitté un hérétique sans avoir pris le temps de lui loger une balle en pleine poitrine. Mais ces sujets sont généralement confiés à d'autres unités suffisamment influentes pour qu'il ne soit pas nécessaire de mentionner leur nom à haute voix sans raison. »

languages.text: «Esas son sin duda las peores amenazas para el Imperium, y jamás dejo ir a ningún hereje sin su merecida dosis de plomo. Pero de esos menesteres ya se encargan otras instituciones que son lo bastante influyentes como para no mencionar sus nombres en vano».
languages.original_text: "Those are indeed the greatest threat to the Imperium, and I never leave a heretic I meet without a bullet lodged inside them. But such matters are primarily handled by other forces, which are influential enough so as not to be mentioned out loud without a reason."

traits.locale_text: «Esas son sin duda las peores amenazas para el Imperium, y jamás dejo ir a ningún hereje sin su merecida dosis de plomo. Pero de esos menesteres ya se encargan otras instituciones que son lo bastante influyentes como para no mencionar sus nombres en vano».

languages.text: “他们确实是帝国最大的威胁。一旦我发现了异端分子的踪迹，我就会赏他们几颗子弹。不过，此类事务主要是由其他部门负责处理。这些部门都相当有影响力，常人根本不敢无缘无故提及它们。”
languages.original_text: "Those are indeed the greatest threat to the Imperium, and I never leave a heretic I meet without a bullet lodged inside them. But such matters are primarily handled by other forces, which are influential enough so as not to be mentioned out loud without a reason."

traits.locale_text: “他们确实是帝国最大的威胁。一旦我发现了异端分子的踪迹，我就会赏他们几颗子弹。不过，此类事务主要是由其他部门负责处理。这些部门都相当有影响力，常人根本不敢无缘无故提及它们。”

languages.text: "Bunlar gerçekten de İmparatorluk için en büyük tehditler ve karşılaştığım hiçbir kâfiri delik deşik etmeden bırakmam. Ancak bu tür meseleler öncelikle, sebepsiz yere yüksek sesle zikredilmeyecek kadar nüfuz sahibi olan diğer güçler tarafından ele alınır."
languages.original_text: "Those are indeed the greatest threat to the Imperium, and I never leave a heretic I meet without a bullet lodged inside them. But such matters are primarily handled by other forces, which are influential enough so as not to be mentioned out loud without a reason."

traits.locale_text: "Bunlar gerçekten de İmparatorluk için en büyük tehditler ve karşılaştığım hiçbir kâfiri delik deşik etmeden bırakmam. Ancak bu tür meseleler öncelikle, sebepsiz yere yüksek sesle zikredilmeyecek kadar nüfuz sahibi olan diğer güçler tarafından ele alınır."

languages.original_text: "Those are indeed the greatest threat to the Imperium, and I never leave a heretic I meet without a bullet lodged inside them. But such matters are primarily handled by other forces, which are influential enough so as not to be mentioned out loud without a reason."
